channel.title: Chaotic crossbow hits are to low? [HELP STILL NEEDED]
channel.description: I just added chaotic crossbow to my server [pi/dspk] hybrid pvp and the max it can hit is 10. it gives a range bonus of 187. how can i make it it higher?

item.title: Chaotic crossbow hits are to low? [HELP STILL NEEDED]
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

lardain:

you can ad ints in the itemlist ,and try to use diamond bolts (e) maybe that wil work tho and if it uses melee you should add to give it melee bonus

it gives range bonus 187â€¦ it gives range exp, it doesnt use melee,

item.title: Chaotic crossbow hits are to low? [HELP STILL NEEDED]
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

clawzkillall:

Im using that same base. The crossbow isnt actually set as a ranged item. It is currently set as a melee. Just change that (I forget how but if i do it on mine sometime soon ill tell you) and itll hit normal.

I did. I completly added it, so it gives range exp, and uses correct bolts. I just need to know how i can make it hit higher.
